verbs.description: [ARG0: Donald Trump] [V: says] [ARG1: he will meet with North Korean dictator Kim Jong - un on June 12 in Singapore] .
Donald Trump says he [V: will] meet with North Korean dictator Kim Jong - un on June 12 in Singapore .
Donald Trump says [ARG0: he] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: meet] [ARG1: with North Korean dictator Kim Jong - un] [ARGM-TMP: on June 12] [ARGM-LOC: in Singapore] .
